page.title: 08LIFE ON MARK MOOR
page.content: Tradesmen mainly serving houses in the northern third, a baker & a butcher deliver doorstep deliveries of milk and other goods often carried on floats. Shopping, people need to travel to nearby towns but Mark village 4 miles has a general store & Post Office & a greengrocer selling flowers and garden needs. Public houses serving meals are in Mark. Refuse Collection, weekly collections by Sedgemoor D.C. but refuse has to be put by the roadside. Nearest Amenity Tip is 11 miles away at Bridgwater. Public Transport. There is none in the area. Private cars are needed to reach nearest bus route & railway station each 4 to 6 miles away.
